pr_title: Remove unnecessary anon types being generated in API Docs

timeline.message: Remove unnecessary anon types being generated

timeline.bodyText: What is the purpose of using a queue ?
timeline.author: hemikak

replies.bodyText: In the case of an anonymous object function having a anon return(ex- lang.stream->iterator function->return(T8)->next function->returns T7) if we use a an arraylist, a concurrentmodication exception is thrown. This is because when we are iterating through the module.linkedAnonObjects and creating the anon types, another anon type is getting added to the module.linkedAnonObjects.
replies.author: shehan360
